title_teim: The seventh annual induction ceremony. 1992. Awards Reel #32 1/16/92
title_ssm: The seventh annual induction ceremony. 1992. Awards Reel #32 1/16/92
title_si: The seventh annual induction ceremony. 1992. Awards Reel #32 1/16/92
summary_teim: The 1992 Rock Hall inductions of Sam & Dave, The Yardbirds, and Bill Graham. The footage is shot head-on towards the podium.
summary_ssm: The 1992 Rock Hall inductions of Sam & Dave, The Yardbirds, and Bill Graham. The footage is shot head-on towards the podium.
contents_teim: Sam Moore accepts award – Mary Prater accepts award – The Edge inducts The Yardbirds – All remaining members of The Yardbirds accept award – Ahmet Ertegun shares story about Bill Graham – John Fogerty inducts Graham – Family members of Graham accept award
contents_ssm: Sam Moore accepts award – Mary Prater accepts award – The Edge inducts The Yardbirds – All remaining members of The Yardbirds accept award – Ahmet Ertegun shares story about Bill Graham – John Fogerty inducts Graham – Family members of Graham accept award
series_teim: Annual induction ceremony (Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Foundation)
series_ssm: Annual induction ceremony (Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Foundation)
series_sim: Annual induction ceremony (Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Foundation)

collection_sim: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Foundation Records
collection_authority_ssm: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum
archival_series_authority_ssm: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum
abstract_ssm: At 1992 Induction Ceremony -- Sam Moore accepts his award -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces Mary Prater -- Mary Prater (wife of Dave Prater) accepts award oh behalf of Dave -- Jann Wenner introduces The Yardbirds -- Video montage of The Yardbirds -- The Edge inducts The Yardbirds -- Members of The Yardbirds accept their awards -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces Bill Graham -- Video montage of Bill Graham -- John Fogerty inducts Graham – Family members of Bill Graham accept the award on his behalf
